page.title: 15WEAVERS COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL
page.content: {WEAVERS SCHOOL}is based at the top of Weavers Road. There are 3 blocks, the J block, the music and science block and the main block. There is a sports centre which is used by the school from 9 until 5. Every year there is a Christmas concert and later in the year a musical is performed. In past years The Wizard of Oz, Oliver and Oklahoma have been shown. There is a staff of 65 teachers for 1000 pupils. There is an intake of about 200 children in the first year. Originally the building was a factory and later became Wellingborough Technical Grammar School. Then it became one of Wellingborough's first Comprehensive schools, with a catchment area in the western side of the town. The school has a thriving orchestra and a Science Road Show which visit local Primary schools.
